MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Questions about subject and family history given prior to first study visit

speech_delay.Description: Does your child have speech delays/problems? (ie: stutters, difficult to understand?)

struggle_reading.Description: Does your child struggle with reading?

struggle_reading_explanation.Description: If yes [struggle_reading], please describe the nature of their difficulty:

reading_disability_tested.Description: Has your child ever been tested for a Reading Disability?

reading_disability_diagnosis.description: If your child HAS been tested for a Reading Disability, please list diagnosis:

tutoring_reading.Description: Is or has your child received remediation/tutoring for reading issues?

struggle_math.Description: Does your child struggle with math?

math_disability_tested.Description: Has your child ever been tested for a Math Disability?

math_disability_diagnosis.description: If your child HAS been tested for a Math Disability, please list diagnosis:

tutoring_math.Description: Is or has your child received remediation/tutoring for math issues?

regular_classroom.Description: Is your child in a regular classroom?

skipped_grades.Description: Has your child repeated or skipped any grades?

individual_education_plan/504_plan.Description: Does your child have an Individualized Education Plan or a 504 Plan?

learning_preference_teacher.Description: How does your child prefer to learn? Selected: Listening in class to teacher.

learning_preference_visual.Description: How does your child prefer to learn? Selected: Viewing visual information provided in class.

learning_preference_demonstrations.Description: How does your child prefer to learn? Selected: Watching demonstrations

learning_preference_peer-interactions.Description: How does your child prefer to learn? Selected: Interaction with peers

learning_preference_discussions.Description: How does your child prefer to learn? Selected: Participating in discussions

learning_preference_other.Description: How does your child prefer to learn? Listed answer

mother_age.Description: Mother's age within indicated five year increment to protect subject identification

mother_occupation.Description: First two digits (major and sub-major group) of ISCO-08 occupation code based on free response answer

mother_learning_problems.Description: Mother: Any history of learning problems

mother_speech_problems.Description: Mother: Any history of speech problems

mother_behavioral_problems.Description: Mother: Any history of behavioral problems

mother_medical_problems.Description: Mother: Any history of medical problems

mother_emotional_problems.Description: Mother: Any history of emotional problems

mother_drug_alcohol_abuse.Description: Mother: Any history of drug or alcohol abuse

father_age.Description: Father's age within indicated five year increment to protect subject identification

father_occupation.Description: First two digits (major and sub-major group) of ISCO-08 occupation code based on free response answer

father_learning_problems.Description: Father: Any history of learning problems

father_speech_problems.Description: Father: Any history of speech problems

father_behavioral_problems.Description: Father: Any history of behavioral problems

father_medical_problems.Description: Father: Any history of medical problems

father_emotional_problems.Description: Father: Any history of emotional problems

father_drug_alcohol_abuse.Description: Father: Any history of drug or alcohol abuse

family_history_learning_problems.Description: Family: Any history of learning problems

family_history_ADD.LongName: Family history of attention deficit disorder
family_history_ADD.Description: Family: Any history of attention deficit disorder

family_history_behavioral_problems.Description: Family: Any history of behavioral problems

family_history_neurological_problems.Description: Family: Any history of neurological problems
